title: Tahiti: pacific cocktail
creator_credit: John Gray, Neil Edwards, Ivan Chapman and Australian Broadcasting Commission
brief_description: A report, as the ABC’s contribution to the International Television Federation, on Tahiti, emphasising the decision of the French Government to expand tourism as an economic measure.
